p: Ortho-diphenol content was determined by the method described by Tover et al. [ 43]. Sodium molybdate (1 mL) was added to diluted aliquots of the methanolic extracts and the various fractions, mixed and the absorbance measured at 370 nm. Ortho-diphenol content was expressed as mg gallic acid equivalents (GAE)/100 g DW. The experiment was conducted in triplicate.
